entity.text: Fc-gamma receptor signaling pathway involved in phagocytosis

sentence.text: The purpose of these recommendations is to answer the following question: in case of deeply infiltrating endometriosis associated infertility, what is the chloride transport therapeutic strategy? First-line surgery and then in vitro fertilization (IVF) in case of persistent infertility or first-line IVF, without surgery? After exhaustive literature analysis, we suggest the following recommendations: studies focusing on spontaneous fertility of infertile patients with deeply infiltrating endometriosis found spontaneous pregnancy rates about 10%.
